name: Kades Crypto Widgets
author: Kimi

sections.description:
Displays Cryptocurrency widgets. More widgets and chart to come. Crypto market data from https://www.cryptocompare.com/dev/widget/wizard/ and ICOs information from https://icowatchlist.com/. You can make your own widgets as well. Learn more at KadesThemes.com.

Theme Compatible With KADES CRYPTO WIDGETS

Bitcoinee – free Cryptocurrency WordPress Theme by Kades Themes.

Kades Crypto Widgets plugin will work with any theme, but it may require some styling to make it match. We always here to support you if any problems happen.
sections.installation:
1. Upload the plugin files to the /wp-content/plugins/kades-crypto-widgets directory, or install the plugin through the WordPress plugins screen directly.
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ screen in WordPress
  3. Use the Appearance->Widgets screen to pick Kades Crypto Widget you want or access Customize panel > Widgets > select Sidebar > Add a widget
sections.changelog:
1.0.3

  • New widget: ICOs upcoming
  • Fix: widget Header on small device responsive
  • Update: plugin’s description

1.0.2

  • add Kades Crypto Tabbed widget & fix bug.

1.0

  • Initial public release
sections.faq:
Installation Instructions

  1. Upload the plugin files to the /wp-content/plugins/kades-crypto-widgets directory, or install the plugin through the WordPress plugins screen directly.
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ screen in WordPress
  3. Use the Appearance->Widgets screen to pick Kades Crypto Widget you want or access Customize panel > Widgets > select Sidebar > Add a widget
